event.description: Marco Scutaro grounds out, second baseman Adam Kennedy to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Aaron Hill strikes out swinging.
Alex Rios hit by pitch.
Vernon Wells singles on a soft line drive to right fielder Jack Cust. Alex Rios to 3rd.
Adam Lind singles on a ground ball to right fielder Jack Cust, deflected by second baseman Adam Kennedy. Alex Rios scores. Vernon Wells to 3rd.
Jose Bautista called out on strikes.
Lyle Overbay homers (5) on a fly ball to right field.
Raul Chavez grounds out, pitcher Sean Gallagher to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Travis Snider doubles (6) on a fly ball to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Marco Scutaro singles on a line drive to right fielder Jack Cust. Travis Snider to 3rd.
Aaron Hill pops out to third baseman Bobby Crosby.
Alex Rios pops out to second baseman Adam Kennedy.
Vernon Wells singles on a ground ball to left fielder Matt Holliday.
With Adam Lind batting, Vernon Wells steals (4) 2nd base.
Adam Lind doubles (12) on a line drive to right fielder Jack Cust. Vernon Wells scores.
Jose Bautista grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi. Adam Lind to 3rd.
Lyle Overbay lines out softly to third baseman Bobby Crosby.
Raul Chavez strikes out on a foul tip.
Travis Snider grounds out, second baseman Adam Kennedy to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Marco Scutaro singles on a ground ball to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Aaron Hill singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Matt Holliday. Marco Scutaro to 2nd.
Alex Rios flies out to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Vernon Wells grounds into a force out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to second baseman Adam Kennedy. Aaron Hill out at 2nd.
Adam Lind grounds out, second baseman Adam Kennedy to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Jose Bautista singles on a line drive to left fielder Matt Holliday.
With Lyle Overbay batting, Jose Bautista steals (1) 2nd base, . Jose Bautista advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by catcher Landon Powell.
Lyle Overbay out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Matt Holliday. Jose Bautista scores.
Raul Chavez flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Pitching Change: Kevin Cameron replaces Sean Gallagher.
Travis Snider singles on a line drive to left fielder Matt Holliday.
With Marco Scutaro batting, throwing error by Kevin Cameron on the pickoff attempt, Travis Snider to 3rd.
Marco Scutaro lines into a double play, right fielder Jack Cust to catcher Landon Powell. Travis Snider out at home.
Aaron Hill grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Alex Rios lines out to second baseman Adam Kennedy.
Vernon Wells flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Adam Lind flies out to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Pitching Change: Jerry Blevins replaces Kevin Cameron.
Jose Bautista singles on a line drive to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Lyle Overbay doubles (8) on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Jose Bautista scores.
Raul Chavez flies out to right fielder Jack Cust.
Travis Snider called out on strikes.
Marco Scutaro singles on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Lyle Overbay scores. Marco Scutaro to 2nd on the throw.
Aaron Hill grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Alex Rios flies out to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Vernon Wells singles on a ground ball to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Adam Lind called out on strikes.
Jose Bautista grounds out to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Orlando Cabrera grounds out, second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Kurt Suzuki flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Jason Giambi walks.
Matt Holliday called out on strikes.
Jack Cust flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Ryan Sweeney grounds out, first baseman Lyle Overbay to pitcher Brian Tallet.
Bobby Crosby walks.
Adam Kennedy pops out to third baseman Jose Bautista in foul territory.
Landon Powell strikes out swinging.
Orlando Cabrera pops out to second baseman Aaron Hill.
Kurt Suzuki grounds out softly, catcher Raul Chavez to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Jason Giambi strikes out swinging.
Matt Holliday singles on a soft line drive to right fielder Alex Rios.
Jack Cust grounds into a double play, first baseman Lyle Overbay to shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Lyle Overbay. Matt Holliday out at 2nd.
Ryan Sweeney grounds out, first baseman Lyle Overbay to pitcher Brian Tallet.
Bobby Crosby called out on strikes.
Adam Kennedy strikes out swinging.
Landon Powell strikes out swinging.
Orlando Cabrera flies out to left fielder Travis Snider.
Kurt Suzuki flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Jason Giambi homers (2) on a fly ball to right field.
Matt Holliday called out on strikes.
Oakland Athletics Manager Bob Geren ejected by HP umpire Paul Nauert.
Jack Cust flies out to right fielder Alex Rios.
Ryan Sweeney flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Pitching Change: Jesse Carlson replaces Brian Tallet.
Bobby Crosby singles on a line drive to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Adam Kennedy grounds into a force out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to second baseman Aaron Hill. Bobby Crosby out at 2nd. Adam Kennedy to 1st.
Landon Powell grounds into a double play, shortstop Marco Scutaro to second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Lyle Overbay. Adam Kennedy out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Scott Downs replaces Jesse Carlson.
Orlando Cabrera singles on a ground ball to right fielder Alex Rios.
Kurt Suzuki flies out to right fielder Alex Rios.
Jason Giambi homers (3) on a line drive to right field. Orlando Cabrera scores.
Matt Holliday flies out to right fielder Alex Rios.
Jack Cust singles on a line drive to right fielder Alex Rios.
Ryan Sweeney singles on a soft fly ball to left fielder Travis Snider. Jack Cust to 2nd.
Bobby Crosby walks. Jack Cust to 3rd. Ryan Sweeney to 2nd.
Adam Kennedy singles on a line drive to right fielder Alex Rios. Jack Cust scores. Ryan Sweeney to 3rd. Bobby Crosby to 2nd.
Landon Powell flies out to right fielder Alex Rios in foul territory.
